Apple Forecast Summary:
There is a 95% chance that an initial investment of $10000 in AAPL will be worth between $938.69 and $438707.25 in 10 years.
The median expected value of a current $10000 investment in AAPL is $20614.6 in 10 years.

The median expected value of a current $10000 investment in AMZN is $217031.8 in 10 years.
